name: cronos the climber
description:
Chronos the climber

::: chronos the climber is a 2d pixel art style game whose objective is to be difficult with a simple aesthetic being very fun and easy to learn

::: in chronos the climber you are a medieval knight that you must go through different levels which you must pass in a limited time while dodging obstacles

::: instructions:::

 :::In chronos the climber you only have to go to the basic direction is to the right and up

 :::You must dodge obstacles, most of them have different ways of passing.

 :::You must be attentive to the fastest passages, there are levels made to pass only with a couple of seconds to go
